subject: Basketball
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: After an off-season spending spree, the Nets are now 14-12, and the sudden demotion of Kris Humphries to $24 million bench warmer practically screams buyer’s remorse.
snippet: After an off-season spending spree, the Nets are now 14-12, and the sudden demotion of Kris Humphries to $24 million bench warmer practically screams buyer’s remorse.
